Why you see this thrift shop on Binance Smart Chain?

This is purely experimental. I want to demonstrate construction of a functional online marketplace where users may proceed to select, proceed to payment through Metamask. Traditional online marketplaces like Amazon, Alibaba, Shopee, Lazada... etc, all depends on credit cards or banks transaction. But this shop is fully independent. All you need is Metamask wallet with some crypto-currency (in the case of Binance Smart Chain, you need BNB, get some test tokens at Binance Smart Chain Faucet). However, you pay the item at your own risk. You have to trust the merchant from the other side (in this case, I am the merchant). To learn more about how you may code your own marketplace like this one, check out the github repo. I simply want to do some experiment! Seriously!

This marketplace is on BSC Testnet! Nothing will be delivered!

Once you pay the items, you'll receive the NFT of the item! This NFT serves as a receipt of your payment. Assume it like a paper receipt, a proof that you had paid for your purchase. You keep it in case you want to return the item. Or you may burn the receipt by sending the NFT to burn address.

Currently stuck at ERC721 batch mint is too expensive!

This is just a test use case!

This is an experimental project of Thrifty Old Student
